comment: Make sure your family and friends see the evidence for themselves : The president asked a foreign power to interfere in the election for his own political gain . Americans deserve free and fair elections . He must be held accountable . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Make sure your family and friends see the evidence for themselves : The president asked a foreign power to interfere in the election for his own political gain . Americans deserve free and fair elections . He must be held accountable . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / ensure-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (f / family
                              :ARG1-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG0 y
                                    :ARG2 (m2 / member)))
                        :op2 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 y
                                    :ARG2 (f2 / friend))))
                  :ARG1 (e2 / evidence-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / ask-02
                              :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
                              :ARG1 (ii / interfere-01
                                    :ARG0 (p4 / power
                                          :mod (f3 / foreign))
                                    :ARG1 (e3 / elect-01)
                                    :purpose (g / gain-02
                                          :ARG0 p4
                                          :ARG1 (p5 / politics)))
                              :ARG2 p4)
                        :beneficiary a)))
      :snt2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (p6 / person
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :ARG1 (e4 / elect-01
                  :ARG1-of (f4 / free-04)
                  :ARG1-of (f5 / fair-01)))
      :snt3 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (h4 / hold-02
                  :ARG1 (a3 / accountable-02
                        :ARG0 (h5 / he)))))

comment: Unemployment at year lows . Wages up % ( way higher than under Obama ) . Median household income up $ k since trump took office . Consumer confidence at its highest in years ... do I need to keep going ?
amr:
# ::snt Unemployment at year lows . Wages up % ( way higher than under Obama ) . Median household income up $ k since trump took office . Consumer confidence at its highest in years ... do I need to keep going ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (e / employ-01
                  :polarity -)
            :ARG2 (l / low-04
                  :mod (y / year)))
      :snt2 (u / up-02
            :ARG1 (w / wage)
            :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity)
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (h2 / high-02
                        :ARG1 w)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more
                        :quant (w2 / way))
                  :ARG4 (u2 / under
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Obama")))))
      :snt3 (u3 / up-02
            :ARG1 (ii / income
                  :mod (h3 / household)
                  :mod (m3 / median))
            :ARG2 (m4 / monetary-quantity
                  :quant 1000000
                  :unit (d / dollar))
            :time (s / since
                  :op1 (t / take-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 " trump"))
                        :ARG1 (o / office))))
      :snt4 (n3 / need-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (k / keep-02
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (g / go-02
                        :ARG0 ii2))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)))
